text: Eman walo! Tumhen halal nahi kay zabardasti aurton ko virsay mein ley betho unhen iss liye rok na rakho kay jo tum ney unhen dey rakha hai uss mein say kuch ley lo haan yeh aur baat hai kay woh koi khuli buraee aur bey hayaee keren unn kay sath achay tareeqay say bod-o-baash rakho go tum unhen na pasand kero lekin boht mumkin hai kay tum kissi cheez ko bura jano aur Allah Taalaa iss mein boht hi bhalaee ker dey
